'''13w18c''' is the sixth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on May 2, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/05/minecraft-snapshot-13w18a/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w18a]] and [[13w18b]] snapshots.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:Block of Coal JE1.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Block of Coal]]'''
* [[Smelting]] time was changed from 720 to 800 seconds.
** Smelts 80 items, the same number of items that 10 [[coal]] can smelt.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w18c|prefix=Snapshot
|;dev
|14632|Enchanted books don't show what tab it is in.
|15035|Skins not loading for players.
|15041|Breaking Item Frames causes a null pointer exception and crash.
|15058|Internal exception: java.lang.NullPointerException.
|;previous
|14979|Wrong particle texture when changing texture packs in-game.
|15095|Coal blocks and note blocks do not show up in creative tabs.
|15096|Game crashes on startup.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* As with [[13w18a]] and [[13w18b]], this snapshot was released on the same day as [[Java Edition 1.5.2|1.5.2]].
